title: Danny Trejo's Big Break, James Brown's Must See Performance, Ebola Outbreak
teaser: In this podcast episode, a nurse from Doctors Without Borders talks about the Ebola outbreak, Danny Trejo's jump from the big house to the big screen, and remembering a 1964 James Brown performance.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
